name: Artifact - Scepter of Time
effect:
This artifact provides one of the following on the turn played:
- Three extra card plays.
- Two extra card draws.
- Unlimited swaps with the reserve fleet (do not count as card plays).
- Placed at the bottom of the discard pile after use.

name: Asteroid Shield
effect:
Occasionally a low-mass asteroid could be pushed and used as a physical shield.
- Played to a ship.
- Terrain must be destroyed before the ship can be damaged.

name: Atmospheric Evasion
effect:
Often a ship would dive into the atmosphere of a nearby planet to avoid weapons damage.
- One point of heavy weapon damage applied to the ship is applied to a terrain card in the fleet instead.
- Discarded after use.

name: Breached City
effect:
- Played on a base just played.
- Base immediately sustains damage sufficient to reduce it to 1 strength point.
- Shields remain intact.
- Discarded after use.

name: Central Galactic Bank
effect:
S/N/AS: ✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

- When engaged, this base can hold unused economy points for use on the following turn.
- If economy points are not used on the following turn, they are lost.

name: CEO
effect:
The Chief Executive Officer of a corporation can do the following:
- When engaged, allows all cards (except itself) in the fleet with economy point requirements to be engaged without economy points.
- When engaged, negates any cards affecting the fleet which deter economic production.
- Functions for only 2 economy if used in a Corporate deck.

name: CFO
effect:
The Chief Financial Officer of a corporation can do the following:
- When engaged, allows unused economy points to be saved for use on the next turn. This occurs during the Allocation Phase and the saved points are not lost unless the CFO or Sector HQ is destroyed or the CFO is damaged.
- Functions for only one economy if used in a Corporate deck.

name: Chakan: The Forever Man
effect:
Chakan has many forms.
- Affected by damage or research.
- Causes 10 damage to any monster.
- Returned to hand when destroyed. Cannot be played until 10 points of monsters are in play against the fleet.

name: Comet Control
effect:
- Played to any comet.
- Comet becomes periodic and is not discarded at the end of its duration.
- or -
- Comet is immediately discarded.
- May not be played on a comet with comet control already played on it.

effect:
- Played to a terrain in the fleet.
- Cannot be used in a psy deck.
- As a reaction, negates one psy function used against the fleet each complete turn.
- Destroyed by psy damage only.

name: Corporeal Traveler
effect:
- Played to a terrain card in the fleet.
- May not be used in a psy deck.
- As a reaction, negates one psy function used against the fleet each complete turn.
- Is destroyed by psy damage or the destruction of the terrain card on which it is played.

name: Cosmic String
effect:
- Played to a field card.
- All functions of that field card are 3 points easier to use.
- Discarded when research points equal to its strength are applied.

name: Cyber Mage Implant
effect:
- The crew card on which this card is played becomes a cyber mage at 1/2 the strength of the crew card plus the strength of this card.
- The one player with the strongest cyber mage in play (no ties) is allowed one extra card play and one extra card draw each turn.

name: Derranged Psy - Deranged Psy
effect:
A deranged psy has lost control of his mental powers.
- Played on a psy in the fleet.
- May perform 3 times as many functions on the turn played at no extra cost.
- Affected psy being and this card are discarded during the Discard Phase of the turn this card is played.

name: Desolation
effect:
- Played on a terrain card with crew.
- Terrain owner selects one crew card to remain on the terrain.
- Move all other crew from the terrain to other locations (crew owners' choices of location).
- Discarded after use.

name: Discovery of Discoveries
effect:
Make the discovery of all discoveries.
- May not be played if no crew cards are in play.
- Draw one card from the deck and place it into the hand.
- Optionally, discard one card from hand and draw another. Continue until no card is discarded.
- Maximum number of cards that may be drawn equals the strength of the lowest crew card in play in the fleet.

name: Divergence of Psy
effect:
- The psy card on which this card is played does not protect the Psy Network for one complete turn.
- Discarded after use.

name: Dragon Harness
effect:
Played on a ship card.
- Each turn, allows the ship to harness one opponent dragon.
- If the dragon is of greater strength than the ship, ship sustains damage points equal to the difference.
- A harnessed dragon cannot use its physical attacks on the turn affected.

name: Dragon Muzzle
effect:
Played on a ship card.
- Each turn, allows the ship to muzzle one opponent dragon.
- If the dragon is of greater strength than the ship, ship sustains damage points equal to the difference.
- A muzzled dragon cannot use its breath weapon on the turn affected.

name: Entertaining Pastime
effect:
- Played to one location.
- All crew at that location may not function for one complete turn.
- Negated by a bartender played in reaction mode.
- Discarded after use.

name: Evolving Terrain
effect:
The terrain card on which this card is played is in its formative stages.
- Two points of damage on the terrain card are repaired each turn.

name: Exploration Mission
effect:
- Played to a ship of equal or lesser strength.
- Ship is sent on an exploration mission and cannot protect its Sector HQ.
- Lasts for two turns.
- Ship generates 10 research on its next Allocation Phase if the ship is in play when this card is discarded.

name: Field of Channeling
effect:
Disciplines: Psycanti

1 - Converging Channel:
- Allows two other psy beings' strengths to be combined to perform 1 function at that combined strength expending 1 function of each psy.

4 - Duo-Channel:
- Allows channeler to duplicate and use one psy function in use by another psy being in the fleet, regardless of strength.

5 - Conduit Channel:
- Allows the lowest strength psy in play to perform one extra psy function at no cost.

8 - Mastery of Channel:
- Increase the strength of one other psy in play in the fleet by 5 strength points.
